mapper.select: SELECT * from kszp WHERE sfzmhm = #{carNo} and ZPLX = #{type} AND TO_CHAR(GXSJ,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') AND ZP IS NOT NULL AND ROWNUM = 1
mapper.update: update KSZP set LSH = #{lsh} where sfzmhm = #{sfzmhm} AND TO_CHAR(GXSJ,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM KSZP WHERE SFZMHM = #{sfzmhm} and ZPLX = #{zplx} and TO_CHAR(GXSJ,'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')
